summary:
This mod add more books to Birna ( merchan woman in Winterhold: http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Birna )
This books it is advisable to read them if the skill is 90. Serves as an increase from 90 to 100.
(AngryTeam: BigProblem, N4, -G-)
descriptionHtml:
This mod add more books to Birna ( merchan woman in Winterhold: http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Birna )

[size=4][b]This is list of added books:[/b][/size]

Every book +1 enchanting (author: N4)

[list]
[*]Nella's book: Master of Enchanting 1
[*]Nella's book: Master of Enchanting 2

Special book: trainers location (author: N4)

This books it is advisable to read them if the skill is 90. Serves as an increase from 90 to 100.

Create .esp file and edit this page BigProblem.

[size=4][b]Instalation:[/b][/size]

[list=1]
[*]Extract .zip file to <skyrim>/data folder
[*]Run launcher.exe and select this mod in "Data files"
[*]Run game and go to Birna in Winterhold
[*]Enjoy

[/list]
author: AngryTeam
